cards.name: Dog
cards.description: A dog is a type of domesticated animal. Known for its loyalty and faithfulness, it can be found as a welcome guest in many households across the world.

cards.name: Cat
cards.description: A cat is a small, typically furry, non-sentient mammal. It is the only domesticated species in the family Felidae and is closely related to the wildcat, which is a small wild-cat.

cards.name: Bird
cards.description: A bird is an animal that can fly, but does not have a backbone. It is the only animal that can fly without a body of support, and is the only animal that can fly without a wingspan.

cards.name: Fish
cards.description: A fish is a cold-blooded vertebrate animal that is a member of the order Anura. It is a member of the class Actinopterygii. It is the only vertebrate animal that can swim.

cards.name: Snake
cards.description: A snake is a carnivorous, non-venomous, non-reptile animal. It is a member of the order Squamata. It is a member of the suborder Agamosperms.

cards.name: Lizard
cards.description: A lizard is a reptile that is a member of the order Reptilia. It is a member of the suborder Crocodylia.

cards.name: Turtle
cards.description: A turtle is a reptile that is a member of the order Testudines. It is a member of the class Testudines.

cards.name: Shark
cards.description: A shark is a fish that is a member of the order Carcharhiniformes. It is a member of the class Carcharhiniformes.
